newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Sight Resource gets buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Sight Resource gets buy.

text.p: Miller, Johnson & Kuehn said Friday it initiated coverage with a buy recommendation of Sight Resource Corp, which operates a network of optical stores that provide eye care.
Miller, Johnson & Kuehn said it expects Sight Resource to expand through acquisition in a fragmented and consolidating industry.
Revenues grew from just over $18 milion in 1995 to $30 million in 1996 and Miller, Johnson & Kuehn estimates $43 million in 1997 and $78 million in 1998.
Shares of Sight Resource closed off 6/16 to 4-3/16.
